messages.message: thanks matt yes there are assertion functions that returns true/false. i should rephrase my question - what would happen if those functions return errors/exceptions? assuming that flow running is triggered automatically not by the user manually, what’s our way to let the user know that they need to double check on some data
there’s a “review batch” page that we were using looking at data not passing validations for the paystub problem, do you know about that?
if those functions return errors / exceptions, then the Flow Review page (part of Flow V2) and opens after opening .ibbatchresults, will result in those documents showing up as "Data Quality issues"
yes, but how would the user know they need to log in and “review batch”?
Fair point; we don't have a mechanism for that really via API, currently we've deployed it for SC where they do things via the website
